text: The University of the Incarnate Word is a private Catholic university in San Antonio, Texas, United States. There are about 5500 students enrolled and it was founded in 1881. == References == * == Other websites == * University of the Incarnate Word - official site Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Texas Category:San Antonio, Texas Category:1881 establishments in Texas
title: University of the Incarnate Word
